alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 1:10PM CST until December 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Tahlequah. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from near Hanging Rock downstream towards Tahlequah. Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 11.9 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
